1.content:
Carmen: age 12 1/2, 7th grade, average height, she loves science, and a really good kid all around! Carmen will be assisting Dr.C in his research of a new soft drink geared towards kids and preteens. Little does Carmen know Dr.C although responsible and well known in the town has been contracted by Procter & Gamble about making a soft drink that'll make kids revert back to bedwetting, or even daytime accidents to help move their products!

Jeff: Age 6 3/4, first grade, longish hair, average height, loves to play soccer and with his 4 year old sister. Hates being treated like a baby. Jeff and his sister Tina will be staying with their aunt from now on after their parents were killed in a car accident. Jeff will not be happy about the living arrangements or how he gets lumped together with his sister and baby cousin.

Sarah: age 16, 10th grade, truly an academic high achiver, she's very athletic, short for her age, loves anything to do with school, she does mind too much if someone mistakes her for a 12 or 13 year old. One day walking home from school she sees a fun looking new store! Her adventures in being mistaken for a child are only just beginning....

Dan: age 11 years old today! 5th grade, average if not a little below average height, loves playing fortnight and trying to do everything his big brother Scott(18) can do while avoiding his 16 year old sister Kayla who loves to torment him. Kayla come across a kit online that'll help her get the little sister she always wanted.

Melody or Mel: 8 1/4 years old, 2nd grade, outgoing and adventurous, but still wets the bed. Mel has lots of friends and family but how will she act around them as her parents get her help for her bedwetting? After all its not called bedwetting if your becoming a baby again...

11.content:
The 12 1/2 year old long haired brunette just heard the bell for her last class before a 4 day weekend when Mrs. Nace called her over to her desk. Carmen waited til her classmates left before meeting her teacher by the big wooden desk at the front of the room.
"Carmen are you excited for a long weekend?" Mrs. Nace said smiling holding a packet of papers.

"Kinda, I really don't have anything planned and my parents are working the whole time." Carmen says kinda glumly.

"Well what if I had a special project for you to do over the weekend and after school for a week or more. It'd be all extra credit, and completely up to you but I think you'd be perfect!" The teach says handing Carmen the packet.

"What is it?" Carmen says looking at the packet labeled 'sodas tester and lab helper'

"Well Dr. C is looking for a student who is really good and interested in science. He's developing a new soft drink and I think you'd be great... well really the whole school does! Your parents can drop you off at his lab in the morning and pick you up later during the day.
What do you say?" Mrs. Nace says excited and is soon given a big hug by her star student!
"Thank you thank you thank you!!! I'm going to telly parents as soon as I get home!" Caren says running off with the packet, jumping on her bike and rushed home.
Once home her parents were already waiting for her both smiling big already hearing the news! Her dad Mike is tall well dressed with short brown hair, while her mother Ann is a little heavy set with blonde hair blue eyes and a large bust.
Their daughter talked about it all night til her mother tucked her in.
The next morning Mike was off to work early in the morning so Ann drove Carmen to Dr. C's lab before heading to work.
Carmen was greeted by the doctor as he ushered her in for a tour!

choices: Doesn't look she's in a hurry to start

114.content:
Carmen waved good bye to her mom as she pretty much skipped over to Dr. C to greet him. "Good morning Dr. C! Thank you so much for this opportunity I'm so excited I can't wait to start!" Carmen says as happy as the girl could be shaking the doctors hand.

Dr. C is a tall man in his 50's with salt and pepper hair and an average build, he's an award winning scientist and very charming too! "Good morning Carmen! Yes I'm very excited too! Let's give you a tour of where you'll be helping me everyday or the next 10 days! If you do well maybe you could be a junior scientist for my lab during the summer. Let's get started shall we?"

The young girl nodded excitingly as the walked into the laboratory. It's a 3 story lab, with offices and small projects being handed by lab technicians on the 2rd and 3th floor so the tour started off with the lobby, then off the the elevator down to the basement lab area. When the doors opened Carmen was in awe of how massive it was as she gazed out seeing a fully high technological laboratory in person, Dr. C carefully showed her around the lab and to the areas they'd mainly be in. From there he led her off to what looked like a hallway of offices.
"Now Carmen the first door on you left is where you'll find your supplies you'll need every morning first thing. (He walks her over to the door opening it.) In the cubbies you'll find a note book, pens, goggles, gloves and shoes. The goggles you'll only need sometimes but you can keep them on you the whole time. In the first locker is where you can keep your clothes, the second locker is where you'll find a new laboratory suit every day. I know it might look childish but its what I could get on short notice and in your size I hope you don't mind. There is also a hand wash sink, and chemical shower just incase of any spills or accidents. The closet doesn't have anything you'll need in there its just supplies from my last helper. You get situated and meet me out in the hallway here and I'll show you a few more things before we start today. Dr. C says with a smile before exiting the room.

Carmen is still in awe she gets to do this, looking around at her own little changing room she can't stop smiling. She looks through the cubbies at all of her supplies that all have her name on them, then she looks at the two pink lockers oping the second to look at her "science suit". She's shocked at how... silly it it looks, its pink with a few layers of padding and has a rainbow on the front left pocket that has her name spelled out very childishly, but after thinking about what Dr. C said she gets her smile back and shrugs off how silly her uniform will look. Carmen is about ready to get undressed and put on her "science suit" when she remembers the closet.

Does she take a look inside or just get on her silly uniform and get back to Dr. C?

13.content:
Sarah finished off a long day of 10th grade that started at 6am with soccer practice, and ended with running track for an hour after school. Its a beautiful Thursday afternoon so she decides to walk home, as the short blonde walks through the outskirts of town she comes across a newer shop that has a lot of random things up in the store front window with the name of the store writen across the top. " 'New things, old you' that sounds fun, I could check it out I do need some new hair clips they should have something cute." The short blonde 16 teen year old says to herself as she walked in.

The clerk behind the counter heard the bell and looked up from her phone to see a young short haired blonde girl who looked not much older than 12, dressed in a simple pink tee shirt, small black gym shorts, pink socks and matching pink sneakers. The girl was obviously wearing a bra but wasn't holding much on the almost flat chested girl.
The clerk stood up from her stool and watched the customer look at different cutesy hair clips before walking over.

"Hello little girl can I help you with anything?"
Sarah looked up at a tall, thin, busty, long haired brunette and paused for a minute before giggling a little.
"No I'm ok I might get a few hair clips though, this short bob cut looks cute but can be a pain when in varsity sports."

"Varsity? But your surely not old enough for that. You look like a middle schooler." The clerk says kneeling down to the small girl.

Sarah giggles. "Its ok I get that a lot, I'm actually 16. My name is Sarah Miles I go to the high school up the road."

"Oh my gosh, I'm so sorry honey! You just look so... little... sorry if thats insulting. My name is Mya."

"Haha no no its all good! I'm well aware that I could pass as a preteen and it doesn't bother me, I fact some times I don't mind it. People are alot nicer to a polite kid than a polite teenager hehe he. Its nice to meet you Mya, this shop is so cute!"

"Well thank you honey, its good to see you embrace your childish looks. Is there anything I can help you with?"

Sarah walks through the store with Mya until she points out something almost like a small child would a new toy. Mya smiles knowing this would be an exciting sale. Mya rings up her new tiny friends purchase and they exchanged goodbyes. Mya laughs as the little girl walked out with a special surprise that'll really help her feel childish. Sarah picked out...

info.brief_description: Going from big kid to baby is harder than it looks.
info.description:
In this interactive we will be watching how teens, preteens, and kids deal with going from being big back down to toddlers, babies, infants, or even back to the womb!
Most of these stories will not be fair, so don't be afraid to have their regressions be cruel or unfair.
***Please 3 sentences or more on each addition, no killing, or sex.
***Rewards will be handed out for detailed, and well presented additions!
Happy writing!
info.pretty_title: How not to be a big kid anymore
